mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (login_name, status, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, msg, login_time) values (#{loginName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{msg}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select sl.* from sys_logininfor sl
and sl.ipaddr like concat('%', #{logininfor.ipaddr}, '%')
and sl.status = #{logininfor.status}
and sl.login_name like concat('%', #{logininfor.loginName}, '%')

and sl.date_format(login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{logininfor.params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
